data.title: Celebrate the Best in Television and Film in 2023 in the 29th Annual Critics Choice Awards
data.text:
2024 is officially underway, which means it’s time to reflect on the best in filmmaking and television in 2023! At the 29th Annual Critics Choice Awards hosted by comedian Chelsea Handler, discover which of your favorite TV shows, movies, and stars of this year critics have deemed ‘the best'.

For even more excitement, tune in early to watch the stars sashay down the red carpet before the ceremony.

Take part in the biggest and brightest awards show of the season Sunday, January 14, beginning with the red carpet at 5P, then stay tuned for the award ceremony at 6P on CW26.

Check out the full list of categories and nominees below.

Movie Nominations:

- American Fiction

- Barbie

- The Color Purple

- The Holdovers

- Killers of the Flower Moon

- Maestro

- Oppenheimer

- Past Lives

- Poor Things

- Saltburn
